mapper.select: SELECT * from WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning where loanNumber = #{loanNum} and financetransfertype='normal'
SELECT mcr.* FROM WEBP2P_PackageMainContentMapping mcMapping,WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning mcr where mcr.OID = mcMapping.contentOID and mcMapping.mainOID=#{mainOID} and productStatus=1
